response.explain: The previous action code successfully opened the fridge, which is the first subtask. There is no execution error. The next step is to take the steak out of the fridge.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take the steak out of the fridge
(3) Cook the steak on the stove
(4) Put the cooked steak on the plate
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 2: Take the steak out of the fridge
    steak = registry(env,"steak_201")
    EasyGrasp(robot, steak)
    donothing(env)
